Name: Helm of Halo's Grace
Functional Text:
When this defends, you may **charge** your hero's soul. If a yellow card is **charged** this way, draw a card.

**Blade Break**

Name: Warpath of Winged Grace
Functional Text:
When this defends, you may **charge** your hero's soul. If a yellow card is **charged** this way, create a Quicken token.

**Blade Break**

Name: Saving Grace
Functional Text:
As an additional cost to play this, you may **charge** your hero's soul.

If you've **charged** this turn, target attack gets -2{p}.
